ygData.subject: Re: Problems compiling NEAT C++
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi I have tried to add using std; right after the includes but I still get the following errors: [mikkelbk@sundli:...neat/finaldir]$ make g++ -g -Wall

get the following errors:
